fields.request: Manual QA: Validate charger landing advanced view refresh handling
fields.request_details:
Use a charger that exposes the public landing page and is linked to your account.
- Visit the public charger landing page and confirm it scales to the device width on a mobile phone or emulator without horizontal scrolling.
- Wait at least 10 seconds to ensure the auto-refresh continues working while idle.
- Tap Advanced View and confirm the page navigates to the authenticated status view (login prompt is acceptable).
- Repeat the Advanced View tap on a mobile device to ensure the automatic refresh does not interrupt navigation.
